entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-11-26
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Analyzer for BCL to prevent exposing non-struct GetEnumerator #95250
  • [System.Text.Json] Serializer loses precision on ulong #95243
  • Is it possible to optimize Array.IndexOf(...) for Type? #95242
  • Native AOT - Static PGO MIBC passed to crossgen2 appears to be ignored #95236

Closed

  • Assertion failed 'interval->isSpilled' during 'LSRA allocate' #66578
    9.0.0
  • RyuJIT: reconsider arm32 callfinally code pattern #59453
    Future
  • JIT: Assertion failed 'i < BitSetTraits::GetSize(env)' during profile synthesis #95199
  • Uuuh I caught linux-x86 on dotnet 7.0 #95240
  • PeriodicTimer the first tick is instantaneous #95238

PullRequests

Created

  • JIT: Factor SSA's DFS and profile synthesis's loop finding #95251
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: Remove questionable transformation #95249
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [DataTable] Cache boolean result from BinaryNode.EvalBinary #95248
    area-System.Data, community-contribution
  • [DataTable] Optimize [NameNode/ConstNode] [=|!=|>|<|>=|<=] [NameNode/ConstNode] filtering #95247
    area-System.Data, community-contribution
  • Delete dead code (HashIdentity) #95246
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Update coreclr test run scripts #95237
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr

Merged

  • JIT: Switch arm32 call-finally to be similar to other targets #95117
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Replace usage of BITS_IN_BYTE with BITS_PER_BYTE #95241
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Fix LSRA handling of arm32 double registers and spilling #94947
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: Skip EH table for inlinees in fgDfsReversePostorder #95200
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Bump dependencies of markdownlint action #95215
    area-Infrastructure
  • [main] Fix incremental servicing condition #95197
    area-Infrastructure-libraries

Updated

  • [CI ONLY] [NativeAOT] ObjWriter in C# #92705
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [PERF] DaysInMonth optimization #95229
    community-contribution, area-System.DateTime
  • Improve `.Distinct().ToList()` and `.Union(e).ToList()` #95224
    area-System.Linq, community-contribution
  • JIT: Assert bbJumpKind in BasicBlock::HasJump #95152
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Convert HELPER_METHOD_FRAME to QCalls (2/N) #95233
    area-Interop-coreclr
  • Remove more `ASG` terminlogy from the codebase #86760
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [release/8.0-staging] Disable implicit rejection for RSA PKCS#1 v1.5 #95216
    Servicing-consider, area-System.Security, 8.0.x
  • [release/7.0-staging] Disable implicit rejection for RSA PKCS#1 v1.5 #95217
    Servicing-consider, area-System.Security, 7.0.x
  • [release/6.0-staging] Disable implicit rejection for RSA PKCS#1 v1.5 #95218
    Servicing-consider, area-System.Security, 6.0.x
  • Optimize "implied relops" in assertprop #95234
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Create a managed implementation of assembly binder #91400
    area-AssemblyLoader-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [RISC-V] Flush-to-zero behavior for float-to-int conversion #94762
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • Add Arm64 encodings for IF_SVE_AA_3A to IF_SVE_HL_3A #95127
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-arm64-sve
  • [NativeAOT] Aging stacks #95221
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Fix invalid parameters in SetFileInformationByHandle #95235
    area-System.IO, community-contribution
